reviewText: The box set would not play on my DVD player. It had an error code that the disks weren't formatted for my machine.  So that was $73 down the drain.

This set was missing one of the DVD for Jewels, it was a two part mini series and only one DVD included.  I watched the first DVD and then it said this is the end of the first part and looked for a second DVD and there was none.  Very disappointed.
Buyer BEWARE!!!! These dvd's do not play in DVD players for Americans.

Danielle Steel movies are like fine American cheese.  You don't want to admit how much you like it, but it's just so delicious!  Unfortunately, I could not get these to work in my player even though it was a multi regional player and should have played them.  Doesn't change the fact that this is a great collection, and if you are successful at getting them to play, you are a video goddess.  The retailer was very easy to deal with and accepted the return, I opted for an Amazon credit since half my paychecks seem to be spent here anyway, and as soon as the package was scanned at the UPS store, the credit was in my account.  I would not hesitate to do business with them again.  Thank You!
Not in DVD format and can't watch it on my TV have to watch on my laptop. They should have said that in the order
The videos are not in a DVD format that can be reviewed in the US.  This should be noted on the specs.

Returning these. Cost too much for them not to work. Only one DVD worked. I usually read the reviews but for some reason I didn't read them and I should have taken the time to read them. I gave it one star because I had to it deserves NO STARS!!!!!

Please Don't waste your money!!! I got my dvds and NONE of them worked!!!!! I wish I had read the reviews before purchasing because I'm not the only one with that problem. All they are good for is the garbage.
